pages.text: Kore wa meiryona keiten no shirushidearu
Kare-ra ga shinja ni narou to shinai tame, anata wa tabun, shinuhodo kuno shite iru kotodearou
Moshi ware ga sono tsumori to nari, ten kara shirushi o kudaseba, kare-ra wa sore ni osoreitte kenkyo ni narudearou
Daga, jihibukaki okata kara kare-ra ni atarashi kunkai ga motarasa reru tabi ni, kare-ra wa itsumo somuki saru
Kare-ra wa (sore o) usodearu to suru.Daga ima ni sono guro suru koto ga, shinjitsu to natte, kare-ra ni furikakaru nodearu
Kare-ra wa, ka no daichi o minai no ka. Ikaga ni oku no, subete no totoi mono o, ware wa soko de sodateru ka o
Hontoni sono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okatadearu
Anata no omo ga musa ni yobikake, ko ose rareta toki o omoi nasai. `Fuhona min no moto ni ike
Firuaun no min no moto ni. Kare-ra wa omo o osorenai no ka
Kare wa moshiageta. `Watashi no omo yo, kare-ra ga watashi o uso-tsuki yobawari suru koto o osore ma su
Watashi no mune wa appaku sa re, mata watashi no shita wa motsuremasu. Desukara harun o, noko washi (tasuke)te kudasai
Mata (sono Jo) kare-ra wa, watashi ni tsumi o ka shite irunode, watashi o korosu no o osoremasu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Kesshite sode wanai. Anata gata ryonin wa, waga shirushi o motte ike. Hontoni ware wa, anata gata to issho ni ite, kiite iru nodearu
Sorede anata gata ryonin wa, firuaun no moto ni itte itte yaru ga i. “Watashi-tachi wa, ban'yu no nushi kara tsukawasa reta shitodearukara
Isuraeru no shison o, watashi-tachi to issho ni ika sete kudasai” to
Kare wa itta. `Anata wa yosho no toki, watashi-tachi no ma de sodate raretade wanai ka. Anata no shogai no oku no nengetsu o, watashi-tachi no ma de sugoshitade wanai ka
Sorenanoni anata wa hidoi koto o shidekashita monoda. Anata wa onwowasureru-sha no nakamadearu
